thread.title: Angelica Aragon de Wagner
thread.title_full: Opodo bewertet von Angelica Aragon de Wagner

author: Angelica Aragon de Wagner
title: Angelica Aragon de Wagner
text: My flight from Mexico-City to Hermosillo was canceled by airline (Volaris). A substitute flight at a later date with an night stopover in the airport Guadalajara was offered by airline. I had to cancel the flight because a connecting trip was lost. Instead of clarifying was referred to low cost airline and did not help. Volaris is a line company.
